function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reduced human movement due to lockdowns","Impact":"Decreased noise and environmental pollution, but potential for decreased immunity due to reduced exposure to pathogens","Mitigation":"Encouraging safe outdoor activities and ventilation, promoting personal hygiene and immune system support","Technologies":"Air purification systems, outdoor air quality monitoring, public health education","People":"General population, particularly those at risk of reduced immunity","Owner":"Public health authorities, urban planners, environmental agencies"},{"Description":"Climatic data gaps due to COVID-19 outbreak","Impact":"Loss of critical data for environmental monitoring and protection, potential for unexpected environmental changes","Mitigation":"Investing in alternative data collection methods, enhancing remote monitoring technologies, developing predictive modeling for environmental changes","Technologies":"Remote sensing, satellite imaging, environmental sensors, predictive modeling software","People":"Environmental scientists, researchers, policymakers","Owner":"Research institutions, environmental agencies, government organizations"},{"Description":"Decreased pollution in city air and water bodies","Impact":"Temporary reduction in environmental pollution, but potential for rebound effect after lockdowns","Mitigation":"Implementing sustainable urban planning, promoting renewable energy sources, enforcing environmental regulations","Technologies":"Renewable energy technologies, pollution monitoring systems, waste management technologies","People":"Urban residents, environmental activists, industry stakeholders","Owner":"City governments, environmental agencies, industry regulations authorities"}]}
